title: Coneheads and Coconuts: Hairdressing Convention Newcastle c1950 [home movie]
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hairstyles
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hair - Care and hygiene
abstract: A futuristic cone head hairstyle is a popular style at this Newcastle NSW convention from the 1950's.
description: One of several films in a collection of 16mm silent home movies shot by Newcastle resident Gordon Edwards. Employed as a cameraman for a local television station, Gordon's amateur film documents some of the more outrageous hairdressing styles and fashions at a hairdressing convention in the 1950s.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003098; Aspects in Fashion; Active; 2015
